snippet: Beginning in October, people in Denmark, Finland, Norway and Sweden will be able to subscribe to HBO Nordic via the Internet, bypassing traditional cable and satellite distributors.
abstract: Beginning in October, people in Denmark, Finland, Norway and Sweden will be able to subscribe to HBO Nordic via the Internet, bypassing traditional cable and satellite distributors.

headline.main: HBO Will Offer Channel by Internet in Northern Europe
headline.print_headline: HBO Will Offer Channel By Internet in Northern Europe
